name: magneto (indiedevv)
description:
the final version of the game made for the jam with @bestkoreanjesus and @leafeon247

IN ORDER TO SUBMIT SCORES YOU MUST USE WINDOWS VERSION!
OTHERWISE YOU WILL BE NAMED WEB_USER AND WE WON"T BE ABLE TO TRACK THE FACT THAT IT'S YOU

we generally all really enjoyed the process and went through a few good loops with the project

HTML5 version is offered but for optimal experience we do recommend using the windows build.

btw we're sorry but no muting or volume controlling is offered by the game itself due to time constraints.

movement : A and D

you can change the magnetism level between 0 to 0.1 for added challenge(with .1 being basically impossible)
